artist: Engraver: A.B. Duhamel; Artist: after Jean-Florentine Defraine; Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
catalogue_raissonne:
Colas 1936
Cabinet des Modes
Le Brun
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Fashion periodical with a trifold hand-colored engraving of a man on the left in a black coat, gray socks, a black hat under his arm, and a sword at his side; in the center a woman holding a white and black mask in a blue and white gown with a wreath of red and yellow flowers and a green bow on her head; on the right a woman holding a black mask in a white and green gown and a hat with a wreath of red flowers with green foliage and whitish/brown plumes
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Quatrième Année, Cinquième Cahier, 11 Janvier 1789
